alert.note: Alert for Adams (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 3:01PM CST until January 03 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CST FOR NORTHERN CONCORDIA...SOUTHERN CATAHOULA PARISHES IN NORTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND NORTHWESTERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 301 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mayna, or over Larto, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Monterey around 320 PM CST. Deer Park around 330 PM CST. Frogmore around 335 PM CST. Ferriday and West Ferriday around 345 PM CST. Natchez around 355 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ridgecrest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
